name: Twisty Ball Shooter with Arrow
description:
The circle is spinning. Who dares to shoot flying arrows to it? Twisty Ball Shooter with Arrow is a fun, addictive, and exciting circle shooting game for all ages. The concept of this spinme and shoot me game is simple, but it’s not easy to master. We have created over 1200 tricky and colorful levels in our game just for you! There are many reasons why you will absolutely fall in love with our archery one tap game after you try it!
***** FREE CASUAL GAME FOR EVERYONE! *****
You can download and play right away without spending money! This game is great for kids and adults. If your kids hate math, reading, or other types of educational game, you can install this game for them and help them focus without counting or reading. This game is also great for adults who love one tap and casual games such as bubble pop, crazy craft games, gumballs game, or other bals games.
***** 1200 TRICKY LEVELS FOR FUN AND EXCITING TIME! *****
Playing a game with many levels are very satisfying. Of course some people prefer infinite or nonstop ball game where the sky is the limit. But for most of us, we love it when we complete one level and then move on to the next. We make 1200 levels for you guys to play so there are enough challenges to satisfy even the most hard core casual game fanatics! However, since lower levels are easier, our game is also suitable for beginners and people who just want to have fun in their spare time.

** EASY GAME CONTROL & GAME RULES BUT HARD TO MASTER **
How to play the game? Just TAP to SHOOT the FLYING ARROWS into the spinning wheel. You only have to be careful not to touch the existing arrows sticking on the ring and make it looks like spinny circle. Easy, isn’t it? On the first few levels we know that you won’t have any trouble at all, even though you aren’t a bowmaster or an archery king. However, the wheel will spin faster and there will be more and more arrows to shoot and avoid. So, keep practicing!

*** AWESOME GAME GRAPHIC & GAME DESIGN ***
The focus of this game is the spinning color circle in the middle with arrows around it. That’s why the graphic focuses on those objects. We don’t want to add so many things that will distract you and make you lost focus. The minimalist game design also means that our game won’t take up so much battery power or processing power when you play it.

Note: although our game is FREE to play forever, you can choose to remove Ads by paying a miniscule amount of money from within the game. We really appreciate it if you do because it helps to support us and our apps. However, you can still enjoy our game FREE FOREVER if you don’t.
Thank you for playing our game and we hope that you have a blast!
